exclusions.description: List exclusions to be applied to the migration

type.description: The type of identity used for the virtual machine.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the Virtual Machine. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

UserAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the Virtual Machine.

principalId.description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client id of user assigned identity.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of LiveDataPathMappings list.
The link used to get the next page of Exclusion Templates list.

isFsRestriction.description: Indicates whether this Exclusion is a Default Exclusion bounded by FileSystem limitation.

isDefault.description: Indicates whether this Exclusion is a Default Exclusion or a User Defined Exclusion from Exclusion Template.

name.description: The name of the exclusion. If it is User Defined Exclusion, then name would be the same as referenced Exclusion Template's name

LDMDateExclusion.description: Live Data Migrator Exclusion based on Date

dateForExclusion.description: Any file with a date earlier than dateForExclusion will be excluded

LDMFileSizeExclusion.description: Live Date Migrator Exclusion based on File Size

maxFileSizeBytes.description: Any file with a file size greater than maxFileSizeBytes will be excluded

LDMPatternExclusion.description: Live Data Migrator Exclusion based on Pattern

pattern.description: Any file path matching the pattern in pattern will be excluded

dateForExclusion.description: Any file with a date earlier than dateForExclusion will be excluded

maxFileSizeBytes.description: Any file with a file size greater than maxFileSizeBytes will be excluded

PatternExclusion.description: Migrator Exclusion based on GLOB Pattern

patternForExclusion.description: Any file path matching the pattern in patternForExclusion will be excluded

plan.description: Plan to use for Store purchase

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of migrators list.

downloadLocation.description: The location for downloading deployment files

version.description: The version of this migrator service

latestAvailableVersion.description: The latest available version of the migrator service

allowance.title: Allowance

seenAt.description: last time a response was received from the server

consecutiveErrors.description: failed attempts to reach the server

metaInstallState.description: The state of the on-prem Migrator metastore installation.

bandwidthPolicy.description: Overall application bandwidth limit to apply

kerberos.title: KerberosConfiguration

metaKerberos.title: KerberosConfiguration
metaKerberos.description: The configuration properties for authenticating to the source metastore

maxBytesPerSec.description: Overall application bandwidth limit to apply.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of migrator targets list.

storageAccountId.description: Resource ID of ADLS Gen 2 account to replicate to

storageEndpoint.description: Endpoint used to connect to the storage account. If not provided it will use the default public endpoint.

oauthClientEndpoint.description: Service principal endpoint (optional). If not provided it will use the default endpoint for your tenant.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of metadata targets list.

metadataTargetKind.description: The type of Metadata Target provider that will be used

jdbcServerHostname.description: Hostname for the Databricks JDBC server.

jdbcPort.description: Port for the Databricks JDBC server.

jdbcHttpPath.description: Path for the Databricks JDBC server.

accessToken.description: Access token for the Databricks server.

fsMountPoint.description: Mount point for the ADLS/S3/GCS location within dbfs filesystem.

convertToDeltaLake.description: Convert table to USING DELTA format and data to Delta Lake format.

sqlUser.description: User to use to connect to SQL database.

hdiVersion.description: The HDI version used by the target metadata cluster.

accountIdentifier.description: The ID of the Snowflake account you're using with the associated data migration.

stageDatabase.description: The Snowflake database to store staging data on for data transformation.

stageSchema.description: The Snowflake schema to be used for storing staging data for data transformation.

stage.description: This should be an external stage which points to the ADLSGen2 file system

warehouse.description: The virtual warehouse to use for the data migration.

schema.description: The Snowflake schema used for the Metadata target

role.description: The Snowflake role you're using which allows you to create, modify, and use the stored data for transformation and migration.

snowflakeAuthKind.description: The kind of snowflake authentication to use

password.description: Password of Snowflake account or passphrase for the private key file

privateKeyFile.description: A path to the location of the private key file (in PEM format) to use for key pair authentication.

MetadataTargetUpdateProperties.description: Properties of Metadata Target to be updated

password.description: Password of Snowflake account or passphrase for the private key file

privateKeyFile.description: A path to the location of the private key file (in PEM format) to use for key pair authentication.
